availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Starrett (Perry/ Muskingham County, Ohio, farmer )

body.p: Perry County and Muskingham County, Ohio, farmer. Ohio native. Married to Sarah Starrett. Father of Elizabeth A. Starrett, Jane Starrett, Nancy E. Starrett, and Sarah C. Starrett. Married to Charity Osler Starrett in Muskingham County, Ohio, on December 15, 1859. Father of Benjamin Starrett, Hannah Starrett, and James W. Starrett. Farmer in Perry County in 1850. Juror in Morgan County in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Perry County, Salt Lick, p. 313B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Ohio, Muskingham County, Highland, p. 127A.
Ohio Marriage Records, Various Ohio County Courthouses, Ohio, Muskingham County Marriages, Film #000910163, p. 12.
"William Starrett (1817-1883)," Find A Grave, Memorial #47702741, accessed September 7, 2021, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/47702741.
KYR-0001-022-0008.
